channel.title: Transformer on Vectors & Verbs
channel.description: Recent content in Transformer on Vectors & Verbs

item.title: The Need For Speed: KV Cache and memory optimization at Inference
item.description: An introduction to KV Caching and its role in optimizing Transformer inference.

item.title: Attention Is All You Need, but exactly which one?: MHA, GQA and MLA
item.description: We are about to touch the holy grail of modern AI. From the original 2017 paper to DeepSeek’s MLA, how has the definition of ‘Attention’ transformed?
